title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 80.5 - Separate notices to be filed in each proceeding
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 80.5 - Separate notices to be filed in each proceeding

State Regulations

Whenever an attorney shall represent the same party or
parties in more than one proceeding before the Division of Alcoholic Beverage

Control, a separate notice of retainer and appearance shall be filed in each
proceeding. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
80.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
